016package app.supernaut.fx.sample;
017
018import app.supernaut.BackgroundApp;
019import app.supernaut.fx.FxLauncherAbstract;
020import app.supernaut.fx.FxForegroundApp;
021
022/**
023 * A simple {@link FxLauncherAbstract} that uses {@link Class} objects to specify {@link BackgroundApp}
024 * and {@link FxForegroundApp}.
025 */
026public final class SimpleFxLauncher extends FxLauncherAbstract {
027
028    /**
029     * Default constructor using background start
030     */
031    public SimpleFxLauncher() {
032        this(true);
033    }
034
035    /**
036     * Constructor that lets you choose background start or not
037     * @param backgroundStart  true to start on background
038     */
039    public SimpleFxLauncher(boolean backgroundStart) {
040        super(DefaultAppFactory::new, backgroundStart);
041    }
042
043    /**
044     * {@inheritDoc}
045     */
046    @Override
047    public String name() {
048        return "simple";
049    }
050}
